quests.name: Browns Crafthouse UBC
quests.riddle:
Where frothing glasses catch the light,
Beyond the Great Nest, shining bright,
For hunger's plea and thirst's delight,
Seek out this haven, just in sight!

quests.name: Sports Illustrated Clubhouse
quests.riddle:
Where legends' triumphs light the **wall**,
And hunger's ancient spirit will **call**,
A haven where heroic deeds enthrall,
And ample plates await you **all**.

quests.name: Kyros Kitchen
quests.riddle:
Where hungry bellies seek a warm **embrace**,
And savory scents fill every open **space**,
Beneath grand archways, where wisdom finds its **grace**,
Discover comfort at a quickened **pace**.
